title: Laziness is Truth
marks:
Signature, Mark, and Seals
 L center: [ ?香女史 ]
description: three characters written horizontally across white sheet; reddish-orange rectangular intaglio stamp URC; four vertical, smaller characters at L; two large square stamps at far L: top stamp contains four squares, three of which are intaglio, the fourth is relief; bottom square with thick outline is relief
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
